full_summary:
# Helicopter Service for Yellowknife
================================================

## Tender Announcement

### Notice ID
WS3677969220

### Amended Notice
First amendment posted on October 28, 2022

### Tender Status
Expired

## Procurement Overview
------------------------

The Canadian government invites proposals for the provision of helicopter services to support the field operations of the Polar Continental Shelf Program of Natural Resources Canada, primarily in and around Yellowknife, Northwest Territories.

## Requirements
----------------

The contract requires a light single-engine helicopter of type Bell 407 or equivalent.

## Selection Criteria
----------------------

The lowest price will be the key factor in the evaluation and selection of the successful bidder.

## Trading Agreements
------------------------

Commercial agreements under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) apply to this solicitation.

## Contact Information
-------------------------

* Name: Kevin Jiang (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [kevin.jiang@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kevin.jiang@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Department: Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

## Notice Details
------------------

* Publication Date: October 27, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: December 20, 2022, 14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: February 22, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: No end date specified

## Location
----------------

* Region: Canada
* Region of Opportunity: None
* Region of Delivery: Canada

## Attachment
----------------

No attachments are included with this notice.

## Link
----------------

View the request for proposal at [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14471212](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14471212).

Please leave a comment below if I should make any amendments or changes.  Thanks for the consideration.  Anything that is unclear I will try my best to rephrase and help clarify the Entry.
